#!/.title: Nihongo Drills | Practise Effectively
#!/.desc: Practise and test your memorisation of Japanese hiragana and katakana characters and their pronunciations using the drills on this site.

#!/character-drills.title: Japanese Kana Character Drills Menu
#!/character-drills.desc: Choose which kana character set you wish to be drilled on: Hiragana or Katakana.

#!/character-drills/hiragana.title: Hiragana Drills Menu
#!/character-drills/hiragana.desc: Choose from the available tests to help you practise the Japanese hiragana characters you have been learning.

#!/character-drills/hiragana/to-voice.title: Hiragana Character-to-Voice Drill
#!/character-drills/hiragana/to-voice.desc: Test your ability to recognise characters and pronounce the corresponding sounds or syllables.  This page displays random hiragana characters for you to identify verbally

#!/character-drills/hiragana/from-voice.title: Hiragana Voice-to-Character Drill
#!/character-drills/hiragana/from-voice.desc: Test your ability to recognise which random Japanese syllable/sound is played by choosing the correct hiragana character from a grid of possibilities.

#!/character-drills/hiragana/write-test.title: Hiragana Character-Writing Drill
#!/character-drills/hiragana/write-test.desc: Test your hiragana writing skill with this drill.  A random Japanese syllable/sound is played and you have to draw the corresponding Hiragana character.

#!/character-drills/katakana.title: Katakana Drills Menu
#!/character-drills/katakana.desc: Choose from the available tests to help you practise the Japanese katakana characters you have been learning.

#!/character-drills/katakana/to-voice.title: Katakana Character-to-Voice Drill
#!/character-drills/katakana/to-voice.desc: Test your ability to recognise characters and pronounce the corresponding sounds or syllables.  This page displays random katakana characters for you to identify verbally

#!/character-drills/katakana/from-voice.title: Katakana Voice-to-Character Drill
#!/character-drills/katakana/from-voice.desc: Test your ability to recognise which random Japanese syllable/sound is played by choosing the correct katakana character from a grid of possibilities.

#!/character-drills/katakana/write-test.title: Katakana Character-Writing Drill
#!/character-drills/katakana/write-test.desc: Test your katakana writing skill with this drill.  A random Japanese syllable/sound is played and you have to draw the corresponding Katakana character.

#!/_about.title: About Nihongo Drills
#!/_about.desc: Explains the purpose of this interactive site and its many useful drills and tests that helps one practise their memorisation and learning of Japanese kana (both Hiragana and Katakana).

#!/_links.title: Useful Japanese learning links.
#!/_links.desc: A list of recommended links to online resources that may help you in your learning of the Japanese language, Nihongo. Come back here to practise!
